form.summary: <input type="text" name="summary" class="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border-gray-300 shadow-sm focus:border-indigo-500 focus:ring-indigo-500" placeholder="Brief summary of the issue" required id="id_summary">
form.description: <textarea name="description" cols="40" rows="6" class="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border-gray-300 shadow-sm focus:border-indigo-500 focus:ring-indigo-500" placeholder="Detailed description (Markdown supported)" id="id_description"></textarea>
form.status: <select name="status" class="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border-gray-300 shadow-sm focus:border-indigo-500 focus:ring-indigo-500" required id="id_status"><option value="1" selected>Open</option><option value="2">In Progress</option><option value="3">Closed</option></select>
form.assignee: <select name="assignee" class="mt-1 block w-full rounded-md border-gray-300 shadow-sm focus:border-indigo-500 focus:ring-indigo-500" id="id_assignee"><option value="" selected>Unassigned</option><option value="1">Alice Cooper</option><option value="2">Bob Wilson</option><option value="3">Charlie Davis</option></select>
